Feelings Fight!

The evil Professor Coldheart is up to no good again. His intense dislike of anything warm and fuzzy is wreaking havoc! Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to stop this villain from turning the world into a horrible, loveless place. Help spread care and love. In the end, who knows...maybe even cold hearted villains will have feelings too.

Choose Your Character

  • Special: Sleepytime! Enemy sleeps through a turn.

  • Name: Grumpy Bear
  • Special: Got the Grumps! Lowers enemy accuracy for 3 turns.
  • Name: Luck Bear
  • Special: Luck of the Irish! Increase personal accuracy.
